Per Wikipedia, The Final Journey is the episode that was played just before the season final. The special at the beginning of season 6 was known as Lost: The Final Chapter. I think the S06E00 is misleading and should  have been labeled S06E17S or something.

"Specials: 2005?2010

This section indexes official specials and recap episodes that were made specifically by the Lost team. Technically these episodes are clip shows but to distance them from the negative stereotypes clip shows receive, they are described as recap specials.

# 	Title 	Narrator(s) 	Aired between 	U.S. Viewers
(in millions) 	Original airdate
